comment:
Extracted Variables:
- Let x be the number of batches of bagels
- Let y be the number of batches of croissants

Extracted Constraints:
- 2x + y \leq 70 (oven time constraint)
- 0.25x + 2y \leq 32 (pastry chef time constraint)
- x \geq 0 (non-negativity constraint)
- y \geq 0 (non-negativity constraint)

Extracted Objective:
- Maximize 20x + 40y (profit objective)
